item.title: Milo Manheim - Like the Zombies Do
item.description:
For educational use. Do It Like the Zombies Do, from Disney’s Zombie’s 2. The play along is for any high, low drum, shaker, and clapping. It could be a djembe with bass & slap, or tubanos, or bongos, or any combination of high & low drums. I will use it with African drum circle instruments in my classroom.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Milo Manheim - Someday - Key of C
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Someday on the ukulele by Milo Manhein and Meg Donnelly from Disney’s Zombies. The chords used are C F G Am Dm.
Original in D - https://youtu.be/5T1neflaL-I
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Milo Manheim - Someday - Key of D
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Someday on the ukulele by Milo Manhein and Meg Donnelly from Disney’s Zombies. The chords used are D G A Bm Em.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
